1.speaker: PANDA
1.character: ねぇねぇ モテ期って知ってる？
1.definition: Hey, do you know about your popularity period?

3.speaker: PENGUIN
3.definition: That would be a steam whistle {\i1}(kiteki){\i0}.

6.speaker: POLAR BEAR
6.definition: What do you mean by "popularity period"?

7.speaker: PANDA
7.character: 人は一生のうちすごくモテる時期があって
7.definition: Everyone has a point in their life when they become very popular

8.character: それをモテ期って言うんだって

11.speaker: PANDA
11.character: ちょっと違うらしいよ
11.definition: Apparently it's a little different. Breeding season only comes around when it's the right season,

12.speaker: PANDA
12.character: モテ期は　努力によって くるらしいんだよ
12.definition: your popularity period apparently comes when you work hard for it. What are you all talking about?

21.speaker: PANDA
21.character: 僕　体重１００キロ以上あるんだ

28.speaker: PANDA
28.character: モテるには　お面で野菜で 重かったりするはずなんだけど…
28.definition: I heard that in order to be popular, you had to have a mask {\i1}(omen){\i0}, vegetables {\i1}(yasai){\i0}, and be heavy {\i1}(omoi){\i0}.

29.speaker: SASAKO
29.definition: By chance do you mean, be good-looking {\i1}(ikemen){\i0}, nice {\i1}(yasashii){\i0}, and funny {\i1}(omoshiroi){\i0}?

30.speaker: PANDA
30.definition: I guess I was a little off.

32.speaker: PENGUIN
32.character: いや　大きく間違ってるから
32.definition: No, he got it completely wrong. Are you making a delivery?

34.speaker: RINRIN
34.character: ありがとうございます

35.speaker: PANDA
35.definition: That must be the popularity period.

36.speaker: RINRIN
36.character: じゃあ　これ 売店に届けてきますので
36.definition: Well, I have to go deliver this to the shop.

39.speaker: HANDA
39.character: ああ　いえ　こちらこそ
39.definition: Oh, no, pardon me, as well.

42.speaker: RINRIN
42.character: ああ　僕は　大丈夫です

49.speaker: PANDA
49.character: なんとかしてあげるから
49.definition: Don't worry, we'll figure it out.

50.speaker: RINRIN
50.character: ああ　パンダくん　おはよう！

51.speaker: PANDA
51.character: リンリンは　僕のこと必要ないでしょ
51.definition: You don't need my help, Rin Rin. Come on, let's go, Mr. Handa. Polar Bear's Café

52.speaker: PENGUIN
52.character: こんにちは！ 聞いて　聞いて！

54.speaker: PENGUIN
54.character: やっと仮免　受かったよ
54.definition: I finally got my temporary license! Finally! At last!

55.speaker: PENGUIN
55.character: あれ？　シロクマくんはいないの？

56.speaker: SASAKO
56.character: 大切な用事があるからって…
56.definition: He said he had something important to do.

57.speaker: POLAR BEAR
57.definition: You're going to do it here?

58.speaker: PANDA
58.character: 協力してね　シロクマくん

59.speaker: POLAR BEAR
59.character: パンダくん　やる気だね

60.speaker: PANDA
60.character: いろいろ情報　仕入れてきたよ

61.speaker: HANDA
61.character: ごめん！　ちょっと お年寄りに道を聞かれてさ
61.definition: Sorry! An older person was asking me for directions. Come on, let's go, Mr. Handa. Where to?

63.speaker: PANDA
63.character: まずは　ファッションだよ

64.speaker: PANDA
64.character: さり気ない　トラッド

65.speaker: POLAR BEAR
65.character: う～ん　ちょっとカタイね
65.definition: Hmm, seems a little too serious. How about punk? I don't know about this either.

66.speaker: PANDA
66.definition: What about Shibuya style? Seems more subculture style. Ooh, this is it!

68.speaker: HANDA
68.character: これじゃ　いつもと同じだよ
68.definition: This is the same thing I always wear. Well, then... For popular fashion,

69.speaker: PANDA
69.character: オスとして 強く　アピールできるものがいいよね
69.definition: we need to find you something that helps you proclaim your manliness.

70.speaker: PANDA
70.character: ニワトリなら　立派なトサカだし
70.definition: For a rooster, it'd be the cockscomb. For a cat, I think it'd be the ears. For birds, it'd be their feathers.

71.speaker: PANDA
71.character: でも　やっぱ　これだよね

73.speaker: PANDA
73.character: 半田さん 日ごろの僕を見てて　わからない？
73.definition: You see me all the time and you don't notice, Mr. Handa?

76.speaker: POLAR BEAR
76.character: ちょっと　きついけど

77.speaker: PANDA
77.character: シロクマくん　パンダみたいだね
77.definition: You look like a panda, Polar Bear.

78.speaker: POLAR BEAR
78.character: パンダくんの代わりに 動物園で働こうかな
78.definition: Maybe I'll work at the zoo in your place, Panda.

80.speaker: HANDA
80.character: 袋　開けたんだから ちゃんと買いなよ
80.definition: You opened the package, so make sure you buy it.

81.speaker: POLAR BEAR
81.character: お財布　持ってきてない

82.speaker: SHOP
82.character: ありがとうございました

83.speaker: PANDA
83.definition: Now, on to the next stop.

84.speaker: PANDA
84.character: グルメ情報も大事らしいよ
84.definition: Apparently, it's also important to know about gourmet foods.

86.speaker: PANDA
86.character: 半田さんの人生にだよ
86.definition: It's important for your life, Mr. Handa.

87.speaker: HANDA
87.definition: I see... Jeez, what's with the lack of enthusiasm?

88.speaker: PANDA
88.character: 僕が　こんなに一生懸命なのに
88.definition: And I'm trying so hard, too.

89.speaker: POLAR BEAR
89.character: おいしそうなもの いっぱい　あるね
89.definition: They have a lot of delicious-looking stuff. Bamboo grass yeast cakes, bamboo grass dumplings, bamboo grass red bean jelly! You should buy it for him. Looks like I don't have a choice. But just one.

93.speaker: POLAR BEAR
93.definition: One hundred yen! One hundred yen!

94.speaker: HANDA
94.character: シロクマくん　何やってるの！？
94.definition: What in the world are you doing, Polar Bear?!

95.speaker: PANDA
95.character: 半田さん　いっぱい　持ってるね　モテモテだよ
95.definition: You've got your hands full, Mr. Handa. You must be popular!

96.speaker: POLAR BEAR
96.character: これで　半田さんも だいぶ　改造人間になったね
96.definition: Handa-san, you're well on your way to being remade, as a cyborg.

97.speaker: HANDA
97.character: いや…　それ　戦っちゃうから
97.definition: No, that'd mean I'd have to fight.

98.speaker: GIRLS
98.character: なんだろう？　こっち　見てるよ

99.speaker: HANDA
99.character: なんだろう？　こっち　見てるよ
99.definition: I wonder what that's about? They're looking over here.

102.speaker: GIRL A
102.definition: If it's not too much trouble...

103.speaker: GIRL B
103.character: 一緒に写真　撮ってもらえますか？
103.definition: Could you take a picture with all of us?

107.speaker: HANDA
107.character: パンダくん　人気者だね

108.speaker: POLAR BEAR
108.character: 僕も一緒に撮ってくる
108.definition: I'm going to get in the picture, too.

109.speaker: HANDA
109.character: もう１枚　撮りますよ

111.speaker: PANDA
111.definition: Wow, that sure was fun! Welcome back. You were gone a long time.

112.speaker: GIRL
112.character: すみません！ 注文　お願いします
112.definition: Pardon me, could you take our order?

113.speaker: SASAKO
113.character: はい　お待たせしました

114.speaker: GUY
114.character: お水のお代わりください
114.definition: Could I get some more water?

117.speaker: PANDA
117.character: 笹子さん　モテモテだね

118.speaker: LLAMA
118.character: あっ！ 半田さんじゃないですか

119.speaker: LLAMA
119.character: すみません お水　お代わり　お願いします
119.definition: Pardon me, could I get some more water?

120.speaker: ANTEATER
120.character: あぁ　半田さん！ 背中　かいてもらえますか？
120.definition: Oh, Mr. Handa! Could you scratch my back?

122.speaker: TORTOISE
122.character: ここに座らないように言って
122.definition: Could you tell him not to sit on me please?

123.speaker: HANDA
123.definition: Sure thing. Thank you very much.

126.speaker: ANTEATER
126.character: も…　もうちょい　右です
126.definition: A bit to the right. Please sit here.

128.speaker: PANDA
128.character: 半田さんにも　やっと…
128.definition: It's finally arrived for Mr. Handa.

131.speaker: LLAMA
131.character: 半田さん お水　もう１杯　もらえますか？
131.definition: Could I get another water, Mr. Handa?

132.speaker: HANDA
132.character: 半田さん　こっちもかいて

133.speaker: ANTEATER
133.character: 半田さん　こっちもかいて
133.definition: Could you scratch over here, too, Mr. Handa?

139.speaker: POLAR BEAR
139.definition: Good for you. Hey! Congratulate me {\i1}(omedetou){\i0}!

140.speaker: PENGUIN
140.character: それは　こんぺいとう！

141.speaker: PENGUIN
141.character: それは　エッフェル塔！

143.speaker: PENGUIN
143.definition: That's not it! That's not it at all! Congratulations.

147.speaker: PANDA
147.character: 永遠に取れないかと思ったよ
147.definition: I thought you'd never get it. That's not even funny.

148.speaker: PENGUIN
148.character: さぁ　これで　ペン子さんと…
148.definition: Now I can take Miss Penko...

149.speaker: PENGUIN
149.character: 海へ　ドライブだよ！
149.definition: for a drive to the ocean!

150.speaker: POLAR BEAR
150.definition: I don't know if it'll be that easy.

153.speaker: POLAR BEAR
153.character: 道を間違えて　海へ行くはずが 山へ行っちゃったり…
153.definition: You get lost and end up going to the mountains instead of the ocean.

154.speaker: POLAR BEAR
154.character: ギア　壊しちゃったり…

155.speaker: POLAR BEAR
155.character: ハンドル　引っこ抜いたり…

156.speaker: PENGUIN
156.character: いや　そんな失敗しないから
156.definition: No, I won't make any of those mistakes.

157.speaker: POLAR BEAR
157.character: でも　ただのドライブじゃないよね？
157.definition: But you're not just going on a drive, right?

158.speaker: POLAR BEAR
158.character: デートだよ　デート

159.speaker: POLAR BEAR
159.character: ペン子さんを助手席に乗せて
159.definition: You'll have to make interesting conversation

160.speaker: POLAR BEAR
160.character: 洒落た会話をこなしつつ
160.definition: with Miss Penko in the passenger seat while not getting lost. Can you do that? That's quite a mission.

161.speaker: PENGUIN
161.character: わかった！ 明日　予行演習しよう
161.definition: I know! Let's go for a practice run tomorrow!

162.speaker: PANDA
162.character: デートの練習って何するの？
162.definition: What do you do on a practice date?

163.speaker: POLAR BEAR
163.character: それは　いろいろ考えてあるから
163.definition: I've got it all figured out.

164.speaker: POLAR BEAR
164.character: ペンギンさん　おはよう

168.speaker: PANDA
168.character: なんで　こんなとこで寝てるの？
168.definition: Why are you sleeping here? Well, I got here three hours ago.

169.speaker: POLAR BEAR
169.character: 早いのはいいけど 寝るのは最悪だね
169.definition: It's good that you're early, but very bad to be sleeping.

170.speaker: POLAR BEAR
170.character: その１　待ち合わせ　不合格

173.speaker: POLAR BEAR
173.character: 合格しないと デートする免許がもらえないの
173.definition: If you don't pass, you don't get your dating license.

174.speaker: PANDA
174.character: デートにも免許がいるんだ？
174.definition: You need a license for dating, too?

176.speaker: PENGUIN
176.character: いや　普通いらないから

177.speaker: POLAR BEAR
177.character: ペンギンさん 今日は僕がデートの教官
177.definition: I'll be your dating instructor today, Mr. Penguin.

179.speaker: POLAR BEAR
179.definition: So, what's your plan for today?

182.speaker: POLAR BEAR
182.character: オシャレなレストランで食事したり
182.definition: No dinner at a fancy restaurant,

183.character: ムード盛り上げる演出はないの？
183.definition: or interesting plans to enhance the mood?

184.speaker: POLAR BEAR
184.character: 考えてなかったでしょ？
184.definition: You didn't think about that, did you? No. 2, Arrangements: Failed.

185.speaker: PANDA
185.character: 合格までの道のりは 厳しそうだね
185.definition: It looks like the path to passing is very hard.

186.speaker: PENGUIN
186.character: あとはどんなチェック項目があるの？
186.definition: What else is on that check list? No. 3, Fun Conversation.

187.definition: No. 4, Delicious Meal. No. 5, Romantic Mood. If you pass all of those, you'll receive a temporary license.

188.speaker: POLAR BEAR
188.character: で　ラブラブでドライブした最後に 愛の告白
188.definition: And after your love love drive, you confess your love.

189.speaker: POLAR BEAR
189.character: そうすれば ラブラブ免許を獲得できるよ
189.definition: If you can do that, you'll receive a love love license.

190.speaker: PENGUIN
190.character: えっ　ラブラブ免許？

192.speaker: POLAR BEAR
192.character: じゃあ　やり直してみよう

194.speaker: POLAR BEAR
194.definition: Good morning. Were you waiting long?

196.speaker: PENGUIN
196.character: 僕も　今　来たところだよ

197.speaker: POLAR BEAR
197.definition: Very nice. You passed. So what are we doing? First we'll go to a delicious restaurant, then to the ocean,

198.speaker: PENGUIN
198.character: ムードを盛り上げて 告白します　教官
198.definition: then I'll enhance the mood, and then I'll confess my love, Instructor! A bit awkward, but I guess you pass.

199.speaker: POLAR BEAR
199.definition: Let's go, then. I feel tired.

200.speaker: PENGUIN
200.character: シロクマくん　運転して

203.speaker: PANDA
203.character: ペンギンさん持ってない？
203.definition: Do you have any, Mr. Penguin?

204.speaker: PENGUIN
204.character: 気が散るから　話かけないで
204.definition: Don't talk to me. It's distracting.

205.speaker: PANDA
205.character: そういえばさぁ　この間ね…
205.definition: Oh yeah, the other day... I just told you not to talk to me.

206.speaker: POLAR BEAR
206.character: ３　楽しい会話　不合格

207.speaker: POLAR BEAR
207.character: もっと盛り上げないと
207.definition: You have to enhance the mood more.

208.speaker: PENGUIN
208.character: だって　男３人でドライブじゃ 盛り上がらないよ
208.definition: But it's hard to enhance the mood when it's three guys.

209.speaker: POLAR BEAR
209.character: 予行演習したいって言ったの ペンギンさんでしょ
209.definition: You're the one that said you wanted to do a practice run.

211.speaker: POLAR BEAR
211.definition: Looks like you've left me no choice.

212.speaker: POLAR BEAR
212.character: うわ～　ステキな景色ね

214.speaker: POLAR BEAR
214.character: 僕がペン子さんのふりしてあげるから
214.definition: I'll pretend to be Miss Penko. So you're a girl from now on, Polar Bear?

215.speaker: POLAR BEAR
215.character: 私　日焼け止め持ってくるの忘れちゃった

216.speaker: POLAR BEAR
216.character: ちょっと　それじゃダメ
216.definition: Hey, that's not going to work. What should I say?

217.speaker: POLAR BEAR
217.character: とにかく褒めて　私を褒めて
217.definition: First you need to compliment me. Just compliment me.

219.speaker: PENGUIN
219.character: シ　シロクマちゃんて 色白できれいだね
219.definition: Y-You're so fair-skinned and pretty, Miss Polar Bear.

220.speaker: POLAR BEAR
220.character: やだ　ペンギンさんたら

221.speaker: POLAR BEAR
221.character: あら　ごめんなさい

222.speaker: POLAR BEAR
222.character: 私　最近　太っちゃって
222.definition: I seem to have gained a little bit of weight lately.

225.speaker: PENGUIN
225.character: シ　シロクマちゃんみたいにポッチャリしてる 女の子のほうが　かわいいよ
225.definition: Chubby girls like you are much cuter, Miss Polar Bear. Really?! Miss Polar Bear, your nails! Your nails!

226.speaker: POLAR BEAR
226.character: あら　ごめんなさい
226.definition: Oh dear. I'm sorry, did my nails hurt?

228.speaker: PENGUIN
228.character: シロクマちゃんの爪　頑丈でステキ
228.definition: Your nails are so sturdy, they're truly fantastic.

232.speaker: PANDA
232.character: よかったね　ペンギンさん

233.speaker: POLAR BEAR
233.definition: What should we do for lunch?

234.speaker: PANDA
234.definition: I want bamboo grass! Somewhere that Miss Penko would like.

236.speaker: POLAR BEAR
236.character: 全然　レストランじゃないわね
236.definition: This isn't much of a restaurant.

237.speaker: PENGUIN
237.character: 本番ではステキなシーフードレストランに行くから
237.definition: When it's the real thing, we'll be going to a fancy seafood restaurant!

238.speaker: POLAR BEAR
238.character: すみません　サーモンください
238.definition: Excuse me. I'd like some salmon.

240.speaker: PENGUIN
240.character: シロクマくんが　食べきっちゃったよ　ここのサーモン
240.definition: You ate all of the salmon in the place, Polar Bear.

241.speaker: POLAR BEAR
241.character: じゃあ　いきましょうか

242.speaker: POLAR BEAR
242.character: もちろん　ペンギンさんのおごりね
242.definition: Of course, you're paying, Mr. Penguin.

244.definition: You were going to make a girl pay on the date?

247.speaker: PENGUIN
247.character: ４　おいしい食事も合格だね
247.definition: No. 4, Delicious Meal: I passed that, right? Conveyor belt sushi feels strange for a date.

249.speaker: POLAR BEAR
249.character: じゃ　合格でいいよ　合格で…
249.definition: All right, we'll say you passed.

250.speaker: POLAR BEAR
250.character: 会話…　ないんだけど

251.speaker: PENGUIN
251.character: そこは　もう合格したから

253.speaker: POLAR BEAR
253.character: ムード　盛り上げないと
253.definition: You have to enhance the mood.

255.speaker: POLAR BEAR
255.character: 会話が途切れたら　ＢＧМとか
255.definition: When the conversation is paused, you need something like background music.

256.speaker: PENGUIN
256.character: ＣＤ　持ってきてないよ

257.speaker: PANDA
257.character: じゃあ　僕　歌うよ

258.speaker: PANDA
258.definition: Sleep, sleep, in your mother's embrace.

260.speaker: PANDA
260.character: ペンギンさん！　眠っちゃ　ダメ！！
260.definition: You're not supposed to fall asleep, Mr. Penguin!

261.speaker: PENGUIN
261.character: なんで　子守唄　歌うの！？
261.definition: Why would you sing a lullaby?!

262.speaker: POLAR BEAR
262.character: これじゃ　合格点　あげられないね
262.definition: I can't give you a passing grade at this rate.

264.speaker: PENGUIN
264.character: 海　見たら　絶対　盛り上がるから！
264.definition: The ocean will enhance the mood! Especially for penguins!

268.speaker: PANDA
268.character: あっ…　ペンギンさん

269.speaker: PANDA
269.definition: One hundred yen! One hundred yen!

270.speaker: PENGUIN
270.character: もう見なくていいから…
270.definition: You don't need to look at it anymore.

271.speaker: POLAR BEAR
271.character: もう… 道　間違えるなんて　最低
271.definition: Seriously. How could you have gone the wrong way?

272.speaker: PANDA
272.character: ペン子さん　怒って帰っちゃうよ？
272.definition: Miss Penko will get mad and go home.

273.speaker: PENGUIN
273.character: 大丈夫…　これは　予行演習
273.definition: It'll be okay, this is just a practice run.

274.speaker: PENGUIN
274.character: 今から行くと　ちょうど 海に夕日が沈む頃だから…
274.definition: If we go now, the sun will be setting across the ocean.

275.speaker: PENGUIN
275.character: 絶対　ロマンチックだよ！！
275.definition: It'll be romantic, no matter what! It's the ocean! But... We missed the sunset.

276.speaker: POLAR BEAR
276.character: ５　ロマンチックなムードは　不合格と…

277.speaker: PENGUIN
277.character: や…　夜景も　きれいじゃない？
277.definition: I-Isn't the night scenery pretty, too?

278.speaker: PENGUIN
278.character: ほらほら　ムードが盛り上がってるよ！
278.definition: See? The mood is getting better!

279.speaker: POLAR BEAR
279.character: じゃあ　いってみる？　告白
279.definition: Then do you want to move on to the confession?

281.speaker: POLAR BEAR
281.character: さあ　ペンギンさん

282.speaker: POLAR BEAR
282.character: 私への思いのたけを　熱く語って
282.definition: Tell me how you really feel about me, passionately.

284.speaker: PENGUIN
284.character: ずっと…　好きでした

286.speaker: PENGUIN
286.definition: Would you... go out with me?

290.speaker: PENGUIN
290.character: いや…　練習とわかっていても ドキドキするよね
290.definition: Even though it's practice, that was nerve-wracking.

291.speaker: POLAR BEAR
291.character: じゃあ… まあ　合格ってことで

292.speaker: POLAR BEAR
292.character: はい　ラブラブ免許
292.definition: Here, your love love license. Yay!

294.speaker: PANDA
294.character: デート　どうだった？

296.speaker: SASAKO
296.character: ありがとうございます

299.speaker: PENGUIN
299.character: いや　ほら…　まだ夏じゃないし 海へドライブには早いよ
299.definition: Well, it's not summer yet. It's not the right season for a drive to the ocean.

301.speaker: PANDA
301.character: ペンギンさん　ペンギンさん

303.speaker: PANDA
303.character: どうしたら　黙っていてもアイドルたちから告白されるかな
303.definition: How can I get idols to confess their love  without me having to work?

304.speaker: PENGUIN
304.definition: Well, that's really impudent. Let's finish it, Polar Bear.

305.speaker: POLAR BEAR
305.character: 次回　しろくまカフェ
305.definition: Next time on Polar Bear's Café...

307.speaker: PENGUIN
307.character: しろくまカフェだけでいいでしょう
307.definition: How about just Polar Bear's Café?
